required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Variation of Genes Controlling Carbohydrate and Lipid Metabolism
clinical_study.official_title: Variation of Genes Controlling Carbohydrate and Lipid Metabolism

brief_summary.textblock:
Aim of the study is to investigate genes regulating glucose and lipid metabolism in subjects whose glucose metabolism, lipid metabolism, blood flow, or body fat distribution has been measured using positron emission tomography (PET), magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS) or computed tomography (CT) as part of their previous participation in clinical trials conducted at Turku PET Centre.
By combining information from PET, MRI, CT, proteomics, metabolomics and genetics analyses we aim to find connection between genetic variation and metabolic and cardiovascular disease.

detailed_description.textblock: The data is collected as a separate part of the clinical imaging study protocols using a separate inform consent approved by the local ethics committee. The participation for this study consists of drawing whole blood, serum and plasma samples for genetics, proteomics and metabolomics analyses. The results from these studies are combined with baseline data from the original clinical imaging studies to find connections between genetic variation, metabolism, blood flow and body fat distribution in a cross-sectional setting.

primary_outcome.description: Skeletal muscle glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.description: Whole body glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg body weight/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Visceral adipose tissue insulin sensitivity to glucose uptake
secondary_outcome.description: Visceral adipose tissue glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Abdominal subcutaneous adipose tissue insulin sensitivity to glucose uptake
secondary_outcome.description: Abdominal subcutaneous adipose tissue glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg tissue/min)
Brown adipose tissue glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Brown adipose tissue glucose uptake during cold exposure
secondary_outcome.description: Brown adipose tissue glucose uptake during cold exposure (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Insulin sensitivity of adipose tissue lipolysis
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma free fatty acid concentration during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (mmol/l)
Myocardial glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Liver insulin sensitivity to glucose uptake
secondary_outcome.description: Liver glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg tissue/min)
Endogenous glucose production during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg body weight/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Brain insulin sensitivity to glucose uptake
secondary_outcome.description: Brain glucose uptake during euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp (µmol/kg tissue/min)
Abdominal subcutaneous adipose tissue mass (kg)
Visceral adipose tissue mass (kg)
Liver fat percentage (%)
Myocardial fatty acid uptake at fasting state (µmol/kg tissue/min)
Liver fatty acid uptake at fasting state (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Abdominal subcutaneous adipose tissue fatty acid uptake
secondary_outcome.description: Abdominal subcutaneous adipose tissue fatty acid uptake at fasting state (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Visceral adipose tissue fatty acid uptake
secondary_outcome.description: Visceral adipose tissue fatty acid uptake at fasting state (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Brown adipose tissue fatty acid uptake at fasting state
secondary_outcome.description: Brown adipose tissue fatty acid uptake at fasting state (µmol/kg tissue/min)

secondary_outcome.measure: Brown adipose tissue fatty acid uptake during cold exposure
secondary_outcome.description: Brown adipose tissue fatty acid uptake at cold exposure (µmol/kg tissue/min)
Skeletal muscle fatty acid uptake at fasting state (µmol/kg tissue/min)
Ratio of myocardial blood flow maximum at stress (ml/g/min) vs. myocardial blood flow at rest (ml/g/min)

study_pop.textblock: Study population consists of participants of previous studies measuring glucose metabolism, lipid metabolism, bloow flow and adiposity at Turku PET Centre. Important subgroups in this study population are healthy volunteers, participants with obesity, prediabetes, type 2 diabetes or cardiovascular disease.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Previous participation of studies measuring glucose metabolism, lipid metabolism, bloow flow and adiposity at Turku PET Centre
Exclusion Criteria:

patient_data.ipd_description: Sharing individual participant data is currently forbidden according to Finnish law.
